shortDescription: Units Page Architecture Modernization & Navigation Enhancement
problem: Legacy Units page architecture with scattered components and no centralized state management
cause: Old architecture pattern with UnitsPageContent and HeaderControls components that didn't follow modern React patterns and lacked proper state management

solution.phase1: Created modern useUnitsPageState hook with centralized state management for loading states, data, and filters
solution.phase2: Implemented useUnitsStats hook for comprehensive statistics calculation and page navigation logic
solution.phase3: Migrated Units page to use direct server component pattern with proper async/await data fetching
solution.phase4: Enhanced BuildingsHeader with units navigation integration and updated BuildingsPageContent routing
solution.phase5: Cleaned up legacy components and updated routing system with optimized lazy loading patterns

testing: TypeScript compilation verified, component structure follows modern React patterns, routing system updated correctly
notes: Established reusable pattern for future page migrations
All components now follow enterprise-grade React patterns
State management centralized with custom hooks
Navigation system properly integrated across building management components
Legacy code removed without breaking existing functionality
